Name: Sokobear: Winter
About the game: Sokobear is the spa's maintenance bear, his job is to turn on the heating and massage system of all the natural pools in this winter spa. Unravel this puzzle with sokoban and bomberman mechanics. Use the ices to direct the tree trunks to the sinkhole and destroy them with your towel when it's convenient to open the way to the objective. At the end of the mission, enjoy a delicious relaxing hot water pool.
